channel.title: Main content on Hugo Techdoc Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Main content on Hugo Techdoc Theme

item.title: Learn
item.description: Learn about Okta and Identity Access Management Click here to give feedback about this page In Phase 1?: “Yes, phase 1 version can be a very simple guide hub.” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, it’s “glue” documentation not related to the product help docs Group Notes Group description: - The “Learn” section guides developers new to IAM and/or Okta through the basics of OAuth, IAM, and Okta’s products.

item.title: Plan
item.description: Plan Click here to give feedback about this page In Phase 1?: “Yes, phase 1 version can be a very simple guide hub.” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, it’s “glue” documentation not related to the product help docs Group Notes Group description: The plan group’s scope includes: Content focused on readers wanting to understand how to plan out their IAM solutions strategically and holistically. The content includes: Available access control strategies Available authentication methods (MFA, biometrics, etc) Policies Deployment considerations including topics such as: Availability Reliability Performance etc Best practices content Content Notes New or existing doc?

item.title: Build
item.description: Build Click here to give feedback about this page In Phase 1?: “Yes, phase 1 version can be a very simple guide hub.” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, it’s “glue” documentation not related to the product help docs Group Notes Group description: This group is oriented toward developers looking for ways to integrate Okta with their applications. The types of docs focus specifically on: Specific use cases Best practices The largest topics are:

item.title: Publish
item.description: Publish Click here to give feedback about this page In Phase 1?: “Yes, but for phase 1 keep changes to existing doc as minimal as possible” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, it’s “glue” documentation not related to the product help docs Group Notes Group description: - Reasons for the name publish: - Aligned with the action/task based focus of the site - The ultimate goal of this section is to “Publish” on the OIN - Some user research evidence

item.title: Reference
item.description: Reference Click here to give feedback about this page In Phase 1?: “Yes, phase 1 version can be a very simple guide hub.” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, it’s “glue” documentation not related to the product help docs Content Notes New or existing doc?: New doc - new content Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Content type: Guide Hub This type of document serves as a central navigational starting point within a larger documentation system.
